subject: Football
Super Bowl
lead_paragraph: The Panthers selected quarterback Cam Newton first over all five years ago, and right behind him the Broncos chose Von Miller, who became the most valuable player of Super Bowl 50 by bedeviling Newton.
snippet: The Panthers selected quarterback Cam Newton first over all five years ago, and right behind him the Broncos chose Von Miller, who became the most valuable player of Super Bowl 50 by bedeviling Newton.
